name: BroCarnage
description:
BioCarnage is exactly as it it sounds: Full of destruction. This is the game where players let off steam by plowing through enemy aliens as angry and determined engineer, crushing the aliens for personal gain. The world has been taken over by the increasing waves of aliens, so the engineer takes up her brother-turned-mech and sets out to defeat as many aliens as possible as revenge.
